ascendancies.name: Warden
ascendancies.flavourText:
A sacred duty. An ancestral promise.
Deliver the fury of the wilds and
tear evil asunder.

ascendancies.name: Deadeye
ascendancies.flavourText:
A woman can change the world 
with a single well-placed arrow.

ascendancies.name: Pathfinder
ascendancies.flavourText:
There are venoms and virtues aplenty in 
 the wilds, if you know where to look.
